subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer is moving rapidly into range of Pete Sampras’s record of 14 Grand Slam titles. He won his 1oth major singles title by beating Fernando González in Sunday’s final at the Australian Open.
snippet: Roger Federer is moving rapidly into range of Pete Sampras’s record of 14 Grand Slam titles. He won his 1oth major singles title by beating Fernando González in Sunday’s final at the Australian Open.
